skins.shipDescription: Graf Zeppelin-class aircraft carrier ¨C Peter Strasser.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Aircraft Carrier B, one of the Graf Zeppelin-class carriers that suffered an unfortunate fate, having had my construction halted without ever getting to set sail. But... doesn't the name "Peter Strasser" have a much nicer ring to it than "Aircraft Carrier B"...?
skins.acquisition: It is I, the never-completed Graf Zeppelin-class "Aircraft Carrier B," otherwise known as Peter Strasser. There is much for us to do and little time to do it... No time to waste. Let's begin.
skins.login: Did you just get here? Heheh. Make sure you work efficiently on your duties today, as always.
skins.details: The expression of the passage of time as the hands of a clock ticking¡ªdon't you think it's just fascinating?
skins.secretaryIdle1: The more precise your plan is, the less time you'll have to waste hesitating on what you need to do. Why not give it a try, Officer?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Heinrich, your documents for your training program are here. Make sure not to forget them next time.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's so nice to see all of the tasks be completed, just as planned. Hehehe.
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it? You've still got time left until your break ends.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Officer, if this helps raise your efficiency, I don't consider it time wasted.

skins.shipDescription: Eugen, you said that this was is a ceremonial outfit from the Sakura Empire? Surprisingly, it does seem to suit me rather well. Oh, I'm supposed to offer my well-wishes for the New Year at this time, yes?
skins.acquisition: Eugen, you said that this was is a ceremonial outfit from the Sakura Empire? Surprisingly, it does seem to suit me rather well. Oh, I'm supposed to offer my well-wishes for the New Year at this time, yes?
skins.login: So you're working over the holidays. How commendable of you.
skins.details: The sands of time pile up to become a mountain; The passing of time eventually becomes history. Hehehe, how interesting.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I hear this is the time of year when New Year's gifts are handed out. Officer, would you rather be the one handing out the gifts or receiving them?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Eugen, Heinrich, there's a limit to how much rucku... teasing you should do.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Graf Zeppelin, why don't you try studying the Sakura Empire's shrines? Even if you don't pay your respects to their gods, the Sakura Empire's amazake seems quite interesting.
skins.secretaryTouch: The plan already takes the holidays into account. There won't be a problem even if you take some time off to rest, Officer.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Officer, are you telling me that this much is enough for you to not be able to hold back?
